question: A friend of yours is thinking of going on a camping holiday for the first time this summer. He/ she has asked for your advice.Write a letter to your friend. In your letterExplain why you think your friend would enjoy a camping holidayDescribe some possible disadvantagesSay whether you would like to go camping with your friend this summer
text: I am writing this letter to give you my advice on your comping holding for the fists time on coming summer.

To begin with, I reckon, you should go  on a camping holiday as you have never had this kind of holiday in your life. Moreover, I assert that you will  enjoy it since this is your first-time camping and can release your stress. But I would like to give suggestions to prepare for your holiday in order to bring your essential medicines or other necessary things such as ten or to bring enough food.

To be honest with you, although I really want to go with you and I know that we will have a great time since we have not seen each other since last year, I have to take care of my mother as she got an accident and her left wrist was broken. Therefore, I am unable to join to go camping with you this summer nevertheless I would like to join with you.
Looking forward to hearing from you about your tip soon.
